string.value: #b#p9270060##k has found out that even more tires have been stolen now. It must be those sneaky villain, #b#o9420530##k, back in town!

This stealing must be stopped now! Let's put an end to it, once and for all! 

#o9420530# #r#a45481##k 
#t4000468# #r#c4000468#/100#k
#b#p9270060##k was happy to announce that life in the city is back to normal that everybody is getting proper transportation they need. What a releif!
Sigh...My worst fears have become reality. I was just informed that even more people have stolen their tires. Even for the public bus, too!
Just imagine a city without proper transportation. Dreadful! Someone has got to put an end to this callous thievery.
You were so brave to take down those sneaky #b#o9420530##k last time. Why don't you step up for the task? Maybe you could bring peace to this city once and for all. What do you say?
Great! We all know that you're perfect for this job. Now, go and hunt #b100 #o9420530#s#k and bring back #b100 \n#t4000468#s#k. You must hurry before this city goes out of function. Go now!
Who could be more perfect for this job than you? Think again...
You have to put an end to this!
I'm happy to tell you that our city life is back to normal, and that everybody is praising you. Thank you.
You have not collected enough tires. We need at least #b100 #t4000468##k in order to provide proper transportation in the city.
Your hunting is not completed yet. Remember, #b100 #o9420530##k more to take down!
